sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Title as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		District as string,
		Population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script: section Section1; shared #"FutureCityAZSQLTable" = let AdfDoc = Sql.Database("ddasvr.database.windows.net", "dda_db"), InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema="stg",Item="FutureCity"]}[Data] in InputTable;shared UserQuery = let Source = #"FutureCityAZSQLTable" in Source;
